function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inability to screen suspected infectors due to large-scale and fast-moving population","Impact":"Increased risk of undetected infections and further disease spread","Mitigation":"Implement non-contact screening methods","Technologies":"5G, remote monitoring","People":"General population","Owner":"Health authorities, government"},{"Description":"Shortage of workers to implement lockdown policy due to home quarantine","Impact":"Inadequate enforcement of lockdown policy and potential for virus spread","Mitigation":"Implement remote supervision and monitoring","Technologies":"5G, remote monitoring","People":"General population","Owner":"Government, law enforcement"},{"Description":"Physical contact during traditional screening methods leading to infection risk","Impact":"Risk of disease transmission and infection among healthcare workers and the public","Mitigation":"Implement non-contact screening methods","Technologies":"5G, non-contact screening technologies","People":"Healthcare workers, general population","Owner":"Health authorities, technology providers"}]}
